posts.post_content:
Hi,

I am looking to fill some holes in my T206 beater set and would like to know if anyone has some banged up cards they would consider selling.  Looking for the commons for now..........let me know what you have!!!!

Thanks,

Andy

[url]andysargent1@hotmail.com[/url]

Hi.....Thanks to everyone who contacted me and made deals with so far.  It has been greatly appreciated.  I'm still looking for more beater commons....let me know what you have!!

Andy
